column2: Time has turned this lie to true. All the things I've done I did to you. But I'm tired to live my life this way. And some day I'll say the things I got to say. I'm tired of believing in you, girl. I tried to believe in you. Cause you're so close to my mind. I'm tired of believing in you, girl. I tried to believe in you. Cause you're so close to my mind. Oh...Oh to my mind. Oh to my mind.... And I don't know exactly why. But I've forgotten how to live. The reason that changed my life. I just wanted to forgive. And you know better than anyone. That I wanted you 'till the end. But my feelings doesn't make no difference now. It's hard to understand. (refr√£o)
